QuestData.Title: Saving Master Ashton
QuestData.Description:
I believe I see Master Ashton in a cage. He must be freed!
Those witches with the long masks appear to be in charge. I bet they would have the means to open his cage.
I will remain here to protect Apprentice Webb and keep the area secure.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take a key from a Hexwood Binder and free Master Ashton.
QuestData.CompletionText: Master Ashton has suffered greatly at the hands of these monsters.
QuestData.RewardText:
We had a few visitors while you were gone but I took care of them.
Ashton's back and safe, though it appears he's seen some of the horrors here.
